Welcome to the documentation for **OverpassAPI.jl**.

## Overview

OverpassAPI.jl is a Julia interface to the [Overpass API](https://overpass-api.de/) for querying [OpenStreetMap](https://www.openstreetmap.org/) data.  Results are returned as typed Julia structs that implement [GeoInterface.jl](https://github.com/JuliaGeo/GeoInterface.jl) traits for interoperability with the Julia geospatial ecosystem.

## Installation

```julia
using Pkg
Pkg.add("OverpassAPI")
```

## Quickstart

```julia
using OverpassAPI

# Query cafes in Durham, NC
r = query("node[amenity=cafe](35.9,-79.1,36.1,-78.8); out;")

# Access elements
for n in nodes(r)
    println(n.tags["name"])
end
```
